message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000 to start negotiations.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $8,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
